name: Endangered Species Word Slide Puzzle Free ( Have Fun And Learn Which Wild Animals Are Almost Extinct )
name_original: Endangered Species Word Slide Puzzle Free ( Have Fun And Learn Which Wild Animals Are Almost Extinct )
description:
Endangered Species Word Slide is a puzzle game in which you need to solve the word puzzle and in the least amount of time possible. Each slide puzzle contains an animal name that is an endangered species. Touch a tile to slide it into an open adjacent space. You must rearrange the letter tiles to spell the word for that level to unlock the next level. The word must be horizontal and in the same row. After 60 minutes you will have to restart the level.

Visit http://www.fws.gov for more info on endangered species.

+ Learn Endangered Species
+ Improve Your Word Game Skills
+ Big Tiles Make It Easy To Play
+ Hint For Solving Word
